articles.description: Varun Dhawan was spotted by the paparazzi on Tuesday. The actor, who has worked with Alia Bhatt in four films, was asked to say something for her and Ranbir Kapoor.
articles.content: Varun Dhawan is currently working on his next, Bawaal. The actor did not attend his Badrinath Ki Dulhania co-star Alia Bhatt's wedding reception after she tied the knot with Ranbir Kapoor last week. … [+1969 chars]

articles.title: Ram Charan gets his chef to cook for BSF jawans in Amritsar.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: Actor Ram Charan, whose popularity continues to grow after the release of director S.S. Rajamouli's epic 'RRR', has got his chef to whip up delicious meals for BSF jawans stationed at the BSF campus in Khasa area in Amritsar.

articles.title: Pregnant Sonam Kapoor ‘sucks up to' Masaba Gupta publicly. Here's why - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sonam Kapoor shared a series of posts, complimenting fashion designer Masaba Gupta. She later revealed she has been waiting for Masaba to make baby bump clothes for her.

articles.title: What Aditya Chopra told Ranveer Singh before his debut: ‘You’re no Hrithik Roshan, toh tu acting kar lena’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ahead of Jayeshbhai Jordaar, Ranveer Singh talks about living his dream, being obsessed with his craft and one advice from mentor Aditya Chopra that left him in good stead.
